meanings.definition: Not smoking or not allowed to smoke.
meanings.sent1: The hotel room was designated as a nonsmoking area.
meanings.sent2: The nonsmoking section of the restaurant was full of fresh air.
meanings.sent3: The nonsmoking rule at the park made the air cleaner for everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsmoking lifestyle was a breath of fresh air in the polluted city.
meanings.sent5: The nonsmoking policy in the office helped everyone breathe easier.

meanings.definition: Designed for or used by nonsmokers.
meanings.sent1: The nonsmoking lounge was a peaceful retreat for those who disliked smoke.
meanings.sent2: The nonsmoking area of the gym was perfect for health-conscious individuals.
meanings.sent3: The nonsmoking car on the train was a haven for those sensitive to smoke.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsmoking jacket was a clear sign of her healthy lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The nonsmoking policy in the hotel catered to guests' preferences for clean air.
